nl.esciencecenter.xenon.engine.util

Class StreamForwarder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.engine.util.StreamForwarder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class StreamForwarder
extends java.lang.Thread
    Simple stream forwarder. Uses a daemon thread to read and write data, has a small buffer, and ignores all exceptions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
